import React,{useState} from 'react' import IconButton from '@material-ui/core/IconButton' import SearchIcon from '@material-ui/icons/Search' import InnerNavbar from '../Components/InnerNavbar' const Search = ()=>{ const style={ width:"400px" } const [searchbarcontent,setSearchbarcontent] = useState(""); const handleSubmit =(event)=>{ event.preventDefault(); console.log(event.target.searchbar.value); if(!event.target.searchbar.value) alert("Select a search type!") if(event.target.searchbar.value.length==0) alert("Search string can't be empty") console.log(event.target.type.value) console.log("handling submit") } return(
) } export default Search;
